column4: anyone running a Hercules Digifire/Fortissimo II without any (volume) problem here ? the module is cs46xx and it's working but the volume is way too low

hello everyone, i ve got some issue with my soundcard (module cs46xx) the sound is working but it's very low, i've already tried quiet a lot of things but i'm still not able to get it work (was working fine under 6.06) any advice/tips ?
ditto in fact i only (hardly) hear something if master adn pcm are a 100%
